item.title: Drawing icons using Core Graphics
item.description: Drawing icons using Core Graphics Sometimes you need to add an icon to your iOS app, The designer sends you that plain, simple icon. It can be a bitmap-based icon, like a PNG. Problem with those is they get blurry if zoomed in too much. So we can use a vector-based icon, like a Font Icon or a PDF. These are vector based, contains the instructions to draw the icon, not the icon itself.
